verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%>. Oh give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%>; for he is <S%H2896>good<s%>; For his <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> endureth for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
Who can <S%H4448>utter<s%> the mighty <S%H1369>acts<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, Or show <S%H8085>forth<s%> all his <S%H8416>praise<s%>?
Blessed <S%H835><s%> are they that <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%>, And he that <S%H6213>doeth<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> at all <S%H6256>times<s%>.
Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Jehovah, with the <S%H7522>favor<s%> that thou bearest unto thy <S%H5971>people<s%>; Oh <S%H6485>visit<s%> me with thy <S%H3444>salvation<s%>,

That I may <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H2896>prosperity<s%> of thy <S%H972>chosen<s%>, That I may <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in the <S%H8057>gladness<s%> of thy <S%H1471>nation<s%>, That I may <S%H1984>glory<s%> with thine <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.
We have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> with our <S%H1>fathers<s%>, We have committed <S%H5753>iniquity<s%>, we have done <S%H7561>wickedly<s%>.

Our <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H7919>understood<s%> not thy <S%H6381>wonders<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; They <S%H2142>remembered<s%> not the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of thy <S%H2617>lovingkindnesses<s%>, But were <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> at the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, even at the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%>.
Nevertheless he <S%H3467>saved<s%> them for his <S%H8034>name<s%>'s <S%H1369>sake<s%>, That he might make his mighty power to be <S%H3045>known<s%>.

He <S%H1605>rebuked<s%> the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%> <S%H2717>also<s%>, and it was dried up: So he <S%H3212>led<s%> them through the <S%H8415>depths<s%>, as through a <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.
And he <S%H3467>saved<s%> them from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of him that <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H1350>them<s%>, And redeemed them from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy<s%>.
And the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> their <S%H6862>adversaries<s%>; There was not <S%H259>one<s%> of them <S%H3498>left<s%>.
Then <S%H539>believed<s%> they his <S%H1697>words<s%>; They <S%H7891>sang<s%> his <S%H8416>praise<s%>.
They <S%H4116>soon<s%> <S%H7911>forgat<s%> his <S%H4639>works<s%>; They <S%H2442>waited<s%> not for his <S%H6098>counsel<s%>,
But <S%H183>lusted<s%> <S%H8378>exceedingly<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, And <S%H5254>tempted<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> in the <S%H3452>desert<s%>.
And he <S%H5414>gave<s%> them their <S%H7596>request<s%>, But <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H7332>leanness<s%> into their <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
They <S%H7065>envied<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> also in the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H6918>saint<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
The <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> and swallowed <S%H1104>up<s%> <S%H1885>Dathan<s%>, And <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H5712>company<s%> of <S%H48>Abiram<s%>.
And a <S%H784>fire<s%> was <S%H1197>kindled<s%> in their <S%H5712>company<s%>; The <S%H3852>flame<s%> burned <S%H3857>up<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.
They <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H5695>calf<s%> in <S%H2722>Horeb<s%>, And <S%H7812>worshipped<s%> a molten <S%H4541>image<s%>.
Thus they <S%H4171>changed<s%> their <S%H3519>glory<s%> For the <S%H8403>likeness<s%> of an <S%H7794>ox<s%> that <S%H398>eateth<s%> <S%H6212>grass<s%>.
They <S%H7911>forgat<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> their <S%H3467>Saviour<s%>, Who had <S%H6213>done<s%> great <S%H1419>things<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>,
Wondrous <S%H6381>works<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2526>Ham<s%>, And terrible <S%H3372>things<s%> by the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%>.

Therefore he <S%H559>said<s%> that he would <S%H8045>destroy<s%> <S%H3884>them<s%>, Had not <S%H4872>Moses<s%> his <S%H972>chosen<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him in the <S%H6556>breach<s%>, To turn <S%H7725>away<s%> his <S%H2534>wrath<s%>, lest he should destroy <S%H7843>them<s%>.
Yea <S%H3988><s%>, they despised the <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>, They <S%H539>believed<s%> not his <S%H1697>word<s%>,
But <S%H7279>murmured<s%> in their <S%H168>tents<s%>, And <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> not unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Therefore he <S%H5375>sware<s%> <S%H3027>unto<s%> <S%H5307>them<s%>, That he would overthrow them in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>,
And that he would <S%H5307>overthrow<s%> their <S%H2233>seed<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, And <S%H2219>scatter<s%> them in the <S%H776>lands<s%>.
They <S%H6775>joined<s%> themselves also unto <S%H1187>Baal-peor<s%>, And <S%H398>ate<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of the <S%H4191>dead<s%>.
Thus they provoked him to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with their <S%H4611>doings<s%>; And the <S%H4046>plague<s%> brake in upon <S%H6555>them<s%>.
Then stood <S%H5975>up<s%> <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%>, and executed <S%H6419>judgment<s%>; And so the <S%H4046>plague<s%> was <S%H6113>stayed<s%>.
And that was <S%H2803>reckoned<s%> unto him for <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, Unto <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>evermore<s%>.
They <S%H7107>angered<s%> him also at the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4808>Meribah<s%>, So that it went <S%H3415>ill<s%> with Moses for their <S%H4872>sakes<s%>;
Because they were <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> against his <S%H7307>spirit<s%>, And he spake <S%H981>unadvisedly<s%> with his <S%H8193>lips<s%>.
They did not <S%H8045>destroy<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>, As <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> commanded <S%H559>them<s%>,
But <S%H6148>mingled<s%> themselves with the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, And <S%H3925>learned<s%> their <S%H4639>works<s%>,
And <S%H5647>served<s%> their <S%H6091>idols<s%>, Which became a snare unto <S%H4170>them<s%>.
Yea <S%H2076><s%>, they sacrificed their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> unto <S%H7700>demons<s%>,

And <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>, Even the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and of their <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, Whom they <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> unto the <S%H6091>idols<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>; And the <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H2610>polluted<s%> with <S%H1818>blood<s%>.
Thus were they <S%H2930>defiled<s%> with their <S%H4639>works<s%>, And played the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> in their <S%H4611>doings<s%>.
Therefore was the <S%H639>wrath<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against his <S%H5971>people<s%>, And he <S%H8581>abhorred<s%> his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.
And he <S%H5414>gave<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>; And they that <S%H8130>hated<s%> them ruled over <S%H4910>them<s%>.
Their <S%H341>enemies<s%> also <S%H3905>oppressed<s%> <S%H3665>them<s%>, And they were brought into subjection under their <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

Many <S%H7227><s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> did he <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H4784>them<s%>; But they were rebellious in their <S%H6098>counsel<s%>, And were brought <S%H4355>low<s%> in their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.
Nevertheless he <S%H7200>regarded<s%> their <S%H6862>distress<s%>, When he <S%H8085>heard<s%> their <S%H7440>cry<s%>:
And he <S%H2142>remembered<s%> for them his <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, And <S%H5162>repented<s%> according to the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of his <S%H2617>lovingkindnesses<s%>.
He <S%H5414>made<s%> them also to be <S%H7356>pitied<s%> <S%H6440>Of<s%> all those that carried them <S%H7617>captive<s%>.

Save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H3068>us<s%>, O Jehovah our <S%H430>God<s%>, And <S%H6908>gather<s%> us from among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, To give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>, And to <S%H7623>triumph<s%> in thy <S%H8416>praise<s%>.

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, From <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> even to <S%H5769>everlasting<s%>. And let all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H543>Amen<s%>. <S%H1984>Praise<s%> ye <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%>.
